Events.Text: Use your imagination to generate a conversation about the topics 'Find apartment', 'Schedule apartment viewing' and 'Calling a ride' (in any order), as shown on the left. You may also ask the assistant to check the weather.  [instruction 1 of 8]

Scenario.UserTask:
Come up with your own scenario!

About you:
- Your name: Angela
- Today is Thursday

 The AI Assistant can handle:
- Find an apartment (prices are in 'credits')
- Schedule an apartment viewing 
- Calling a Taxi/Uber/Lyft ride 
- Checking the weather forecast in different Cities (e.g. New York City or Detroit)
Scenario.WizardTask:
Follow the flow charts and help the user. NOTE: When users give PRICE limits, you usually have to use the 'is at most' comparator, not 'is equal to'. Assume:

- Today is Thursday
